entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:13 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries and rain showers beginning near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 06:13 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4.
